abstract: FIFA president Sepp Blatter, after three days of interrogation by Swiss investigators, tells his staff he is innocent of any wrongdoing and has no plans to step down; other soccer news noted.
lead_paragraph: Blatter, the soccer organization’s president, said he had no plans to step down because he did “nothing illegal or improper."
snippet: Blatter, the soccer organization’s president, said he had no plans to step down because he did “nothing illegal or improper."
